metadata.title: Firefighter Wallet Original Reflective Turnout Bunker Fabric Gear Women Gift
features: ✔️ UNIQUE LOOK – Flashfire Supply designed a slick wallet that stands out among others. Offering you a choice of either black or beige fabric combined with high reflective tape colors yellow or orange to match your bunker gear.

✔️ FLAME RETARDANT FABRIC – Carefully chosen flame retardant turnout gear to give the most realistic firefighter aspect. The exterior of the wallet is composed of genuine kevlar & aramid fabric. Horizontally a flame retardant fluorescent reflective tape.
✔️ MULTIPLE POCKETS – Multiple pockets for your cards. Including a transparent ID pocket. Inside the wallet you have a dollar bill separator for paper money and important receipts.
✔️ VARIETY OF COLOR – Flashfire Supply wants you to match your turnout gear by offering different mix and match styles.
✔️ PERFECT GIFT – Offer a unique gift that can be carried every day. This firefighter wallet will catch everyone attention in the firehouse and make the chiefs jealous.
description: Being a firefighter is not only a job for the men this is why Flashfire Supply considered creating the perfect and most visible wallet for brave women out there ! We are proud to present you a slim wallet that can be carried everyday. Keep in mind that we have chosen genuine firefighter fabric including a high quality flame retardant kevlar fabric. That will pearl each water drops that stands on it. No more wet dollar bills! Original fluorescent tape the middle grey tape reflects with the presence of a light and can be spotted from a far distance. The reflective band is available in different bright colors; lime yellow or bright orange. The perfect gift for a women firefighter that wants to carry his turnout gear in his back pocket.
metadata.details: {"Brand": "Flashfire Supply", "Color": "Beige & Orange", "Material": "Aramid", "Style": "Slim Wallet", "Pattern": "Solid", "Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Product Dimensions": "4.72 x 3.54 x 0.59 inches; 4.09 Ounces", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "November 3, 2018"}
